name: Exact Command
description:
In this new 2BrosInACup release you play as two robots named Billy and Orangutan. You are trapped in two separate dungeons. In the end they must find each other once again.

Made in 48 hours as a submission to the GMTK Game Jam

A 2BrosInACup Production

Game Design - Joey Carroll  and Brian K

Music - Brian K

Character Design - Joey C
